home.featuresSubtitle: Discover the unique capabilities of Spoframe

design.title: Stylish Design
design.description: Elegant frames that complement any interior, adding a touch of sophistication to your space.

integration.title: Spotify Integration
integration.description: Easily connect to Spotify to display album covers, playlists, and more right on your frame.

display.title: Customizable Display
display.description: Slideshow and static image modes available. Customize content sources, frame rate, and display brightness to your preferences.
